Title.Language: Psali Adam on the Fourth Canticle

Text.Language: Aftwnf n~je V]: m~v~r/] m~v/e~tenkot: hina n~tefcw]: n~n/e~tauenkot.
The Lord has risen / as one who sleeps / that He may save / those who have fallen asleep.
قام الله مثل النائم لكى يخلص الراقدين.
Bon niben e~taumou: afqoybou n~je v~nobi: cottou afnahmou: n~je P[oic piaynobi.
All those who have died / killed by sin / were saved and rescued / by the sinless Lord.
كل الذين ماتوا وقتلتهم الخطيئه خلصهم ونجاهم الرب الذى بلا خطية.
Genoc n~nirwmi: nem Adam peniwt: afnahmou qen ouh/bi: n~je P[oic pimanvwt.
The human race / with our father Adam / was saved from sadness / by the Lord, the shelter.
جنس البشر مع ابينا آدم خلصهم من الحزن الرب الملجا.
Dauid gar afjoc: qen pefnis] n~caji: je aftwnf n~je Po#c#: afjwr n~nefjaji.
David has spoken / in his great saying, / "The Lord has risen / and scattered His enemies."
لأن داود قال ?ى كلامه العظيم قام الرب وبدد اعداءه.
Eybe vai tenhwc: ouoh tener'alin: nem niaggeloc: qen oumetatkin.
Therefore we praise / and sing with the angels / without boredom.
من اجل هذا نسبح ونرتل مع الملائكة بغير ملل.
Ze ontoc a~l/ywc: n~teneryeo~rin: e~pefw~ou eynecoc: ouoh tener'alin.
Truly indeed / we marvel / at His good glory / and we sing.
حقاً بالحقيقة نتعجب لمجده الحسن ونرتل
?ppe ic piaggeloc: afcaji nem nihio~mi: je aftwnf a~l/ywc: fw] n~netenermwoui~.
Behold, the angel / spoke with the women./ "Truly He is risen / wipe away your tears."
هوذا الملاك تكلم مع النسوة قائلا قام حقاً امسحن دموعكن.
Yel/l ouoh rasi: qen oua~polaucic: hiwis ouoh mosi: n~ca tefa~nactacic.
Rejoice and be joyful / with pleasure / go and preach / His resurrection.
تهللن وا?رحون بنياح اذهبن وبشرن بقيامته
Ic nih~bwc eu,/: nem picodarion: n~ywou euermeyre: e~pefmuct/rion.
"Behold, the clothes placed / with the headcover / witness to His / mystery."
هوذا الثياب الموضوعة مع العمامة هى تشهد بسره.
Kalwc qen oumeym/i: afouwnh nan m~voou: n~je paihwb m~m/i: ouoh efmeh n~w~ou.
It was truly / revealed to us today / this true Lamb / full of glory.
حسناً بالحقيقة ظهر لنا هذا العمل الحقيقى المملوء مجداً.
Lali w~ Maria: ]bwki ouoh ]mau: a~m/ qen ouparr/cia~: e~qoun e~pim~hau.
Sing O Mary / the handmaiden and mother / come with daring / and enter the tomb.
تهللى يا مريم العبدة والام تعالى بدالة وادخلى إلى القبر.
Marefrasi ]nou: n~je peniwt Adam: ouoh marefsousou: n~je Abraam.
Now rejoice / that our father Adam / and Abraham / may be proud.
?لي?رح الآن ابونا آدم ولي?تخر ابراهيم.
Nipul/ n~te a~men]: afqomqem m~mwou: n~h~r/i sa toucen]: n~je v/e~tafyamiw~ou.
The gates of Hades / He has destroyed / even its foundations / which' He has made.
ابواب الجحيم سحقها حتى اساساتها الذى صنعها
Xc~marwout qen ouc~mou: nem ouw~ou etkeniw~out: v/e~tafjem] pim~v~mou: aftwnf qen n/eymwout.
You are blessed with blessing / and precious glory / O who has tasted death / and rose from the dead.
تباركت بالبركة وبالمجد الثمين يا من ذقت الموت وقمت من الاموات
Ouoh aknohem: n~nie,malwtoc: qen t~jij m~pirefhwlem: piantikimenoc.
And You have saved / the captives from the / hand of the opposing / violent one.
وخلصت المسبيين من يد المغتصب المضاد.
Picahoui~ n~a~pac: afbolf e~bol haron: qen t~jom m~Maciac: v/e~tafmou qaron.
The old curse / He released us from / with the power of the Messiah / who died for us.
اللعنة القديمة حلها عنا بقوة ماسيا الذى مات عنا.
Rwn afmoh n~rasi: pioujai afi~ saron: tenmetbwk ecensasi: afbolbf e~bol.
Our mouth is filled with joy / Salvation came to us / the bitter bondage/ He released from us.
?منا امتلأ ?رحا والخلاص اتى إلينا وعبوديتنا المرة ?كَّها عنا.
Cwtem e~Dauid p~ouro: afcaji afermeyre: je a~Po#c# e~rouro: e~bolhi ouse.
Listen to king David / he spoke and witnessed / saying, The Lord has reigned / on a tree.
اسمعو داود الملك تكلم وشهد قائلاً قد ملك الرب على خشبة.
Twnk P[oic V]: qen ounis] n~w~ou: ouoh marouerho]: n~je nekjaji euhwou.
Arise O Lord God / in great glory / let your evil enemies / be frightened.
قم ايها الرب الاله بمجد عظيم وليخ? اعداؤك الاشرار.
Uc# Yc# penn/b: afvwnh m~penh/bi: e~ourasi efk/b: afcotten qen nennobi.
The Son of God, our Master / turned our sorrow / into increased joy / and saved us from our sins.
ابن الله سيدنا حول حزننا إلى ?رح متضاع? وخلصنا من خطايانا
Vai pe pie~hoou: e~ta P[oic yamiof: marenyel/l m~voou: ouoh n~tenounof.
This is the day / that the Lord has made / let us rejoice today / and be glad.
هذا هو اليوم الذى صنعه الرب ?لنتهلل اليوم ون?رح
<ere ]a~nactacic: n~te penouro: piw~ou naf qen teftaxic: nem tefmetouro.
Hail to the Resurrection / of our King / glory to Him in His position / and His kingdom.
السلام لقيامة ملكنا المجد له ?ى رتبته وملكوته.
"wt/r m~pikocmoc: qen tekparoucia~: nohem m~peklaoc: nem tekekk~l/cia~.
O Savior of the world / in Your appearance / save Your people / and Your Church.
يا مخلص العالم ?ى ظهورك خلص شعبك وكنيستك.
Woun~h/t pimairwmi: e~h~r/i e~jen neke~biaik: moi nan n~oucw]: je anvwt harok.
Have patience O Lover of Mankind / on Your servants / grant us salvation / for we take refuge in You.
اطل اناتك يا محب البشر على عبيدك واعطنا خلاصاً لأننا إلتجانا إليك.
